review: I am under Dr Bhalla's treatment since last three years. He is very polite, make an in-depth analysis of the problems and has very good experience for diagnosing the issues. He also advises the right thing to the patients including the diet to maintain a healthy lifestyle. During covid times also he was available over the teleconsultation and his continual advises and treatments benefitted many patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
